name: Eldara Whisperleaf
role: Seer of the Council of Elders
motivation: To interpret the will of the gods through the stars and protect Durn from external threats by sharing her visions with the Council.

name: Lirael Starfire
motivation: To ensure the sanctity and accuracy of celestial observations at Starwatch Peak, uncovering the mysteries of the universe.

name: Thorne Silverbark
motivation: To maintain the balance of magical energies in Durn and safeguard the Gloomwood from exploitation and harm by outsiders.

name: Kaelan the Seeker
role: Founder of the Seekers of the Mirror
motivation: To unlock the secrets of the Celestial Mirror and gain foresight into events that could alter the fate of Durn and beyond.

name: Sylvia Moondancer
role: Mystic Guide of the Whispering Glade
motivation: To offer wisdom and clarity to those who visit the Whispering Glade, bridging the understanding between mortal and magical realms.
